Spanish: ¡Te he juzgado mal! Buscaré a otra persona, ¡¡Vete!!

English: I've heard Private Leo has been successfully rescued! Please accept this reward!
Spanish: ¡¡He oído que el Soldado Leo ha sido rescatado con éxito!! ¡¡Acepta esta recompensa!!

English: Has Private Leo been rescued yet?
Spanish: ¿El Soldado Leo aún necesita ser rescatado?

English: Visit dungeon NPC to learn all about Event
Spanish: Visita el NPC de la mazmorra para saber todo sobre el evento.

English: Rescue the missing childrens
Spanish: Rescatar a los niños desaparecidos

English: The children from the town have gone missing... Please rescue them from the monsters!
Spanish: Los niños del pueblo han desaparecido. ¡Por favor, rescátalos de los monstruos!

English: I need you to save $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ childrens in any dungeon, before midnight.
Spanish: Necesito que salves $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ niños en cualquier mazmorra, antes de medianoche.

English: You can find childrens in any dungeon. They will be in a cage and you will just have to get the key from the boss to save them!
Spanish: Puedes encontrar niños en cualquier mazmorra. ¡Estarán en una jaula y solo tendrás que conseguir la llave del jefe para salvarlos!

English: If I'm right, children's lives don't matter to you? No problem.
Spanish: Si estoy en lo cierto, ¿La vida de los niños no te importa? Sin problema.

English: You saved the childrens! Thank you very much, you're my hero!
Spanish: ¡Salvaste a los niños! ¡Muchas gracias, eres mi héroe!

English: Someone else saved them. You were too slow and incompetent.
Spanish: Alguien más los salvó. Fuiste demasiado lento e incompetente.

English: I need to rescue $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ childrens in any dungeon by midnight.
Spanish: Necesito rescatar a $QUEST_END_TRIGGERCTRL_COUNT$ niños en cualquier mazmorra antes de la medianoche.

English: Make Monster Shaved Ice
Spanish: hacer Hielo Raspado Monstruoso

English: It's definitely hot today.\nThere's a special food that can blow this heat away, do you want to know?
Spanish: Definitivamente hace calor hoy.\nHay un alimento especial que puede quitar este calor, ¿Quieres saberlo?

English: Don't be surprised! It's Monster Shaved Ice!\nIt's a special recipe by me with monster ingredients.\nIf you want know how it tastes, go find the ingredients before the ice melts!
Spanish: ¡No te sorprendas! ¡Es Hielo Raspado Monstruoso!\nEs una receta especial mía con ingredientes monstruosos.\nSi quieres saborearla, ¡Busca los ingredientes antes de que el hielo se derrita!

English: You're not curious? You must not be too hot...
Spanish: ¿No tienes curiosidad? No debes tener demasiado calor...

English: Here you go! Hurry up and try it before it melts!
Spanish: ¡¡Aquí tienes!! ¡Date prisa y pruébalo antes de que se derrita!

English: Oh why are you so late? Your ice already melted and it can't be used...
Spanish: ¿Por qué llegas tan tarde? Tu hielo ya se derritió y no se puede usar.

English: Are you still collecting?\nIf the ice melts, we can't make the shaved ice so hurry up!
Spanish: ¿Sigues coleccionando?\nSi el hielo se derrite, no podremos hacer hielo raspado, así que ¡¡Date prisa!!

English: Defeat the monsters before the ice metls and return to Sotta\n(Can redo the quest if failed)
Spanish: Derrota a los monstruos antes de que el hielo se derrita y regresa con Sotta\n(Puedes repetir la misión si falla)

English: Coral Island
Spanish: Isla Coral

English: Clouds Over Coral Island
Spanish: Nubes sobre Isla Coral

English: Hero, the clouds over the island to the southeast have finally cleared!
Spanish: ¡Héroe, las nubes sobre la isla del sureste finalmente se han despejado!

English: For the longest time we have been unable to travel to the famed Coral Island. I wonder who or what caused the clouds to dissipate?
Spanish: Durante mucho tiempo no hemos podido viajar a la famosa Isla Coral. Me pregunto quién o qué causó que las nubes se disiparan.

English: Regardless of the reason, perhaps you should go pay a visit to the island and see what's new.
Spanish: Independientemente del motivo, quizás deberías ir a visitar la Isla y ver qué hay de nuevo.

English: Many years ago a skilled blacksmith from Darken City named BoBu traveled through the fog in search for rare materials. Go seek out Coral Island and see if BoBu managed to survive.
Spanish: Hace muchos años, un hábil herrero de Ciuda Darken llamado BoBu viajó a través de la niebla en busca de materiales raros. Ve a buscar Isla Coral y mira si BoBu logró sobrevivir.

English: I understand hero, Coral Island has been uncharted territory for many years... Come back to me if you change your mind.
Spanish: Entiendo, héroe, Isla Coral ha sido territorio inexplorado por muchos años. Vuelve si cambias de opinión.

English: Hello there traveler, I didn't expect to see one of you so soon after the clouds around Coral Island were lifted...
Spanish: Hola viajero, no esperaba ver a ninguno después de que se levantaran las nubes envolviendo Isla Coral...

English: Go seek out Coral Island and see if BoBu managed to survive.
Spanish: Ve a buscar Isla Coral y mira si BoBu logró sobrevivir.

English: Find Your Bearings
Spanish: Encuentra tus Aspectos

English: Long ago I sailed into the mist that surrounded this island, hoping to discover something new and untouched in the land of Madrigal.
Spanish: Hace mucho tiempo navegué hacia la niebla que rodeaba esta isla, con la esperanza de descubrir algo nuevo e intacto en la tierra de Madrigal.

English: I found Coral Island nestled deep into the clouds, but something kept me from ever leaving.
Spanish: Encontré Isla Coral enclavada profundamente entre las nubes, pero algo me impidió irme.

English: The mist that covered the island held some magic that prevented those who arrived from escaping.
Spanish: La niebla que cubría la Isla contenía cierta magia que impedía escapar a los que llegaban.

English: With Coral Island open to all, we may begin seeing more travelers arrive over time. For now, go introduce yourself to Sunny Pang. Sunny Pang will help you in your adventures around the island.
Spanish: Con Isla Coral abierta a todos, es posible que comencemos a ver llegar más viajeros. Por ahora, preséntate a Pang Soleado. Él te ayudará en tus aventuras por la Isla.

English: Take your time, the island has a lot to offer. Come back to me when you are ready.
Spanish: Tómate tu tiempo, la Isla tiene mucho que ofrecer. Vuelve conmigo cuando estés listo.

English: Wow, it's a real adventure! It's been so long since we've had anyone come visit Coral Island. I wasn't sure this day would ever come!
Spanish: ¡Guau, es una verdadera aventura! Ha pasado tanto tiempo desde que alguien vino a Isla Coral. ¡No estaba seguro de que este día llegaría otra vez!

English: Introduce yourself to Sunny Pang.
Spanish: Preséntate a Pang Soleado.

English: An Island Shrouded in Mystery
Spanish: Una isla envuelta en misterio

English: Those who call Coral Island their home have been unable to explore the world due to a curse placed on the island many years ago.
Spanish: Aquellos que llaman a Isla Coral su hogar no han podido debido a una maldición colocada en la isla hace muchos años.

English: The cause of the cursed mist that has kept the Coral Island inhabitants trapped is unknown.
Spanish: Se desconoce la causa de la niebla maldita que ha mantenido atrapados a los habitantes de Isla Coral.

English: However with the mist cleared from around the island, we can finally welcome fresh new faces to help us defend our small village!
Spanish: Sin embargo, una vez que la niebla se haya disipado, ¡Finalmente podremos ver caras nuevas que nos ayudarán a defender nuestro pequeño pueblo!

English: Coral Island is a dangerous place. To prove you are an adventurer capable of surviving the dangers here, I want you to go explore the island and take down 200 of any kind of Atrox.
Spanish: Isla Coral es un lugar peligroso. Para demostrar que eres un aventurero capaz de sobrevivir a los peligros aquí, quiero que vayas a explorar la isla y elimines 200 Atrox de cualquier tipo.

English: We didn't expect everyone that arrived to be strong enough for this place. Perhaps you can return to Darken City.
Spanish: No esperábamos que todos los visitantes fueran lo suficientemente fuertes para este lugar. Quizás puedas regresar a Ciudad Darken.

English: I am impressed! Atrox are dangerous beasts known to cut down most creatures that approach them. You have proven yourself.
Spanish: ¡Estoy impresionado! Los Atrox son bestias peligrosas conocidas por matar a la mayoría de las criaturas que se les acercan. Has demostrado tu valor.

English: Atrox are dangerous foes, you'll need to successfully defeat more of them to prove yourself to me.
Spanish: Los Atrox son peligrosos, tendrás que derrotar con a más de ellos para demostrar tu valía ante mí.

English: Defeat 200 of any kind of Atrox, then return to Sunny Pang.
Spanish: Derrota a 200 Atrox de cualquier tipo y regresa con Pang Soleado.

English: Clear the Paths
Spanish: Limpiar los caminos

English: Word has been going around the village about a strong new visitor that can hold their own against the ferocities of Coral Island.
Spanish: Se ha corrido la voz por el pueblo sobre un nuevo visitante fuerte que puede defenderse de las ferocidades de Isla Coral.

English: The number of Tigars on the island have exploded recently, and we're not sure why. It's hardly safe to walk along the paths of Coral Island anymore.
Spanish: La cantidad de Tigars en la isla se ha disparado recientemente y no estamos seguros de por qué. Ya no es seguro caminar por los senderos de Isla Coral.

English: If you are willing to help us, go hunt enough Tigars to keep our paths safe for a while. Around 300 should do.
Spanish: Si quieres ayudarnos, cazar Tigars para mantener nuestros caminos seguros. Con 300 deberían ser suficientes.

English: Perhaps no one is powerful enough to defeat the Tigars.
Spanish: Quizás nadie sea lo suficientemente poderoso como para derrotar a los Tigres.

English: Incredible, thank you for your efforts! We can safely travel around the land paths of the island again.
Spanish: Increíble, ¡Gracias por tu esfuerzo! Podremos volver a recorrer con seguridad los caminos de la isla.

English: Tigars hide in the grass, waiting to strike their prey. In just one NaNosecond they pounce to attack.
Spanish: Los Tigars se esconden en la hierba, esperando para atacar. En sólo un NaNosegundo se lanzan al ataque.

English: Defeat 300 of any kind of Tigar, then return to Talus.
Spanish: Derrota a 300 Tigar de cualquier tipo y regresa con Talus.

English: Pirates and Their Pet
Spanish: Piratas y su mascota

English: Your reputation continues to grow in our little village, hero!
Spanish: ¡Tu reputación sigue creciendo en nuestro pequeño pueblo, héroe!

English: The Meral pirates of Coral Island have managed to tame a Lord Tigar. Those thieves have threatened to come rob and destroy our homes.
Spanish: The Meral pirates of Coral Island have managed to tame a Lord Tigar. Those thieves have threatened to come rob and destroy our homes.

English: Defeat the pirates and their gigantic pet before they destroy everything we've built!
Spanish: ¡Derrota a los piratas y a su gigantesca mascota antes de que destruyan todo lo que hemos construido!

English: I wouldn't want to be eaten by a Lord Tigar either. Understandable.
Spanish: I wouldn't want to be eaten by a Lord Tigar either. Understandable.

English: I knew you could do it, hero! For now we can rest, knowing that our village is safe from the Meral pirates and their Lord Tigar!
Spanish: I knew you could do it, hero! For now we can rest, knowing that our village is safe from the Meral pirates and their Lord Tigar!

English: Merals and their pet Tigar are terribly powerful. You'll need to be strong to defeat them.
Spanish: Los Merals y su mascota, el Tigar , son terriblemente poderosos. Tendrás que ser fuerte para derrotarlos.

English: Collect 30 Pristine Pirate Lens from any kind of Meral, and a Gigantic Feline Fang from a Lord Tigar.
Spanish: Collect 30 Pristine Pirate Lens from any kind of Meral, and a Gigantic Feline Fang from a Lord Tigar.

English: King of the Pirates!
Spanish: ¡Rey de los piratas!

English: Woaw, welcome to Coral Island hero! Let me tell you a story of legend, if you don't mind.
Spanish: ¡Guau, bienvenido a Isla Coral, héroe! Déjame contarte una leyenda, si no te importa.

English: Long ago, a huge Meral was once blessed by Shade. The Meral grew twisted and grotesque, but filled with dark power.
Spanish: Hace mucho tiempo, Shade bendijo un enorme Meral. El Meral se volvió retorcido y grotesco, y lleno de poder oscuro.

English: Soon the Overlord Meral became the King of the Pirates of Coral Island, ruling with an iron hook.
Spanish: Soon the Overlord Meral became the King of the Pirates of Coral Island, ruling with an iron hook.

English: Wehehehe, if you defeated that Overlord Meral maybe YOU could become King of the Pirates!
Spanish: Wehehehe, if you defeated that Overlord Meral maybe YOU could become King of the Pirates!

English: I guess we will never know if the legend of the Meral King is true.
Spanish: Supongo que nunca sabremos si la leyenda del Rey Meral es cierta.

English: Woah woah woah! You defeated the King of the Pirates? And that stone...
Spanish: ¡¡Vaya, vaya, vaya!! ¿Derrotaste al Rey de los Piratas? Y esa piedra...

English: It seems this one piece of stone is filled with purple magic... this is definitely the work of Shade.
Spanish: Parece que esta pieza de piedra está llena de magia púrpura... este es definitivamente obra de Shade.

English: Fufufu, the only thing that bothers me is that there is legend of a second piece of magic stone hidden on this island. Maybe one day the two of us will discover where it's hiding!
Spanish: Fufufu, lo que me molesta es que según la leyenda hay una segunda pieza de piedra mágica escondida en la isla. ¡Quizás algún día nosotros dos descubramos dónde se esconde!

English: To find out if the legend is true, you'll need to defeat the Overlord Meral.
Spanish: To find out if the legend is true, you'll need to defeat the Overlord Meral.

English: Defeat the Overlord Meral to collect the Purple Pirate Insignia.
Spanish: Defeat the Overlord Meral to collect the Purple Pirate Insignia.

English: Island Delicacies
Spanish: Delicias Isleñas

English: Ha! You have really made a name for yourself here on Coral Island, hero. Everyone has told me of the amazing feats you've accomplished.
Spanish: ¡Ja! Te has hecho un nombre aquí en Isla Coral, héroe. Todo el mundo me habla de las increíbles hazañas que has logrado.

English: If you want to prove yourself further, help us defeat the legion of Naga that have taken over the island.
Spanish: Si quieres demostrar tu valía, ayúdanos a derrotar a la legión de Naga que se ha apoderado de la Isla.

English: To safely take on the Naga, first you'll need to gather bait made of their favorite foods. You can make bait from any type of Kingster or Creper! Meet up with Pau Pau and he'll prepare everything.
Spanish: Para enfrentarte a los Naga, primero tendrás que recolectar cebo hecho con sus comidas favoritas. ¡Puedes hacer cebo con cualquier tipo de Kingster o Creper! Ve con Pau Pau y él lo preparará todo.

English: Everyone's adventure comes to a close one day. That's alright, hero.
Spanish: La aventura de todos llega a su fin un día. Está bien, héroe.

English: Woaw, nice job hero! We can make plenty of bait with all this to lower the guard of the Naga! For now, take a rest. We'll make a plan of attack later.
Spanish: ¡Guau, buen trabajo héroe! ¡Podemos hacer mucho cebo con todo esto para bajar la guardia de los Naga! Por ahora, descansa. Haremos un plan de ataque más tarde.

English: Keep fighting Kingster or Creper until you've found enough bait.
Spanish: Sigue luchando contra Kingster o Creper hasta que encuentres suficiente cebo.

English: Defeat any kind of Kingster or Creper until you've made 200 Island Bait.
Spanish: Derrota a cualquier tipo de Kingster o Creper hasta que hayas hecho 200 Cebo Isla.

English: Lizard People
Spanish: Gente Lagarto

English: I hope you're feeling rested after making all that bait with Pau Pau!
Spanish: ¡Espero que estés fresco después de hacer todo ese cebo con Pau Pau!

English: It's time to go on the offensive and take down as many of the Naga as we can.
Spanish: Es hora de pasar a la ofensiva y acabar con tantos Naga como podamos.

English: Okay hero, go out there and defeat the Naga before they come eat us!
Spanish: ¡Muy bien, héroe, sal y derrota a los Naga antes de que vengan a comernos!

English: The Naga are ferocious, there's no shame in saying no.
Spanish: Los Naga son feroces, no hay que avergonzarse de decir que no.

English: Incredible! Truly amazing! You've conquered the Naga, and nearly all of Coral Island!
Spanish: ¡Increíble! ¡Verdaderamente asombroso! ¡Has conquistado a los Naga y casi toda la Isla Coral!

English: Hopefully soon our village can sleep without keeping one eye open.
Spanish: Ojalá pronto nuestro pueblo pueda dormir sin tener un ojo abierto.

English: Keep going! You need to defeat more Naga.
Spanish: ¡Sigue adelante! Necesitas derrotar a más Naga.

English: Collect evidence of defeating at least 1000 Small Naga, Naga, or Captain Naga. After that, defeat the Lord Naga and Overlord Naga.
Spanish: Collect evidence of defeating at least 1000 Small Naga, Naga, or Captain Naga. After that, defeat the Lord Naga and Overlord Naga.

English: Mission Improbable
Spanish: Misión improbable

English: Hahaha! I cannot thank you enough for all that you have done for our village, hero! Only the most powerful of masquerpets remain a threat to our village now.
Spanish: ¡Jajaja! ¡No puedo agradecerte lo que has hecho por nuestro pueblo, héroe! Ahora sólo los masquerpets más poderosos siguen siendo una amenaza para nuestra aldea.

English: We rarely see the Dorian and Okean creatures approach the village. However with so many other Island evils defeated, I fear they may leave their lair to take advantage of the situation!
Spanish: Rara vez vemos a los Dorian y Okean acercarse al pueblo. Sin embargo, con tantos otros monstruos derrotados, ¡Temo que abandonen su guarida para aprovechar la situación!

English: Go seek out where the Dorian and Okean live. We'll need as much information as we can get if we expect to defeat them!
Spanish: Ve a buscar dónde viven los Dorian y los Okean. ¡Necesitaremos toda la información que podamos obtener si queremos derrotarlos!

English: What!? You can't possibly be scared of a few more masquerpets after all we've been through together!
Spanish: ¿¡Qué!? ¡No es posible que tengas miedo de unas cuantas masquerpets, después de todo lo pasado juntos!

English: Well done, hero! With this information we have a chance to defeat the Dorian and Okean before they can attack!
Spanish: ¡Bien hecho, héroe! ¡Con esta información oodremos derrotar a Dorian y Okean antes de que puedan atacar!

English: Keep searching, the Dorian and Okean make their homes in the waters of Coral Island.
Spanish: Sigue buscando, los Dorian y los Okean tienen sus hogares en las aguas de Isla Coral.

English: Search for where the Dorian and Okean live.
Spanish: Busca dónde viven los Dorian y los Okean.

English: Surprise Attack!
Spanish: ¡Ataque sorpresa!

English: HOOWAH! I'm trembling with excitement!
Spanish: ¡HUAAH! ¡Estoy temblando de emoción!

English: With the information you've brought back, our village has a real chance to take down the Dorian and Okean before they get to us!
Spanish: ¡Con la información que has traído, nuestra aldea tiene la oportunidad de acabar con Dorian y Okean antes de que lleguen a nosotros!

English: Go ahead and defeat as many Dorian and Okean as you can find, including their leaders! We trust you to take down the leaders, we'll be helping with the smaller ones in the back.
Spanish: ¡Adelante, derrota a todos los Dorian y Okean que puedas, incluidos sus líderes! Confiamos en ti para derrotar a los líderes, ayudaremos con los más pequeños en la retaguardia.

English: If we wait too much longer the Dorian and Okean will attack the village!
Spanish: ¡¡Si esperamos mucho más, Dorian y Okean atacarán la aldea!!

English: It's been done, hero. We've defeated the Dorian and Okean, and can now rest easy.
Spanish: Ya está hecho, héroe. Hemos derrotado a Dorian y Okean y ahora podemos estar tranquilos.

English: We're doomed... without your help we will never defeat the Dorian and Okean in time!
Spanish: Estamos condenados... ¡Sin tu ayuda nunca derrotaremos a Dorian y Okean a tiempo!

English: Collect trophies from any defeated Dorian and Okean, and defeat at least one Lord or Overlord of each!
Spanish: Collect trophies from any defeated Dorian and Okean, and defeat at least one Lord or Overlord of each!

English: Inky Darkness
Spanish: Oscuridad Tinta

English: I hope you are ready for our final challenge hero... According to legend, once every few hundred years the Sea King will release spawn onto Coral Island.
Spanish: Espero que estés listo para el desafío final, héroe... Según la leyenda, una vez cada pocos cientos de años, el Rey del Mar libera engendros en Isla Coral.

English: A strange darkness has began to fill the waters of Coral Island, so it seems as if the legend is true.
Spanish: Una extraña oscuridad ha comenzado a llenar las aguas de Isla Coral. La leyenda parece cierta.

English: Please help us stave off the spawn of the Sea King!
Spanish: ¡Ayúdanos a evitar la aparición del Rey del Mar!

English: Thank you! Find where the Sea King has released their spawn, and defeat as many as you can. Let BoBu know once you've finished!
Spanish: ¡Gracias! Averigua dónde ha liberado a sus engendros el Rey de los Mares y derrota a tantos como puedas. ¡Avisa a BoBu cuando hayas terminado!

English: Soon the inky darkness will overflow Coral Island, and we will be engulfed...
Spanish: Pronto la Oscuridad Tinta inundará Isla Coral y seremos engullidos...

English: Hohoho! You really do have a mysterious power within you, don't you hero?
Spanish: ¡Ho Ho Ho! Realmente tienes un poder misterioso dentro de ti, ¿No es así, héroe?

English: Will we become faceless like those that failed before us?
Spanish: ¿Nos volveremos anónimos como los que fracasaron antes que nosotros?

English: Defeat 500 of any type of Kraken.
Spanish: Derrota a 500 Kraken de cualquier tipo.

English: The Sea King Returns
Spanish: El regreso del Rey del Mar

English: The great Sea King of Coral Island has finally returned to wreck havoc upon the land.
Spanish: El gran Rey del Mar de Isla Coral ha regresado para causar estragos en la tierra.

English: The locals told me that getting near the beast could cause mortals to lose their mind...
Spanish: Los lugareños me dijeron que acercarse a la bestia podría hacer que los mortales perdieran la cabeza.

English: This battle will take all the strength we can muster. If you make it out alive, go back to Darken City, and let the mayor know about all that happened here.
Spanish: Esta batalla requerirá toda la fuerza que podamos reunir. Si sales con vida, regresa a Ciudad Darken e informa al alcalde de todo lo que sucedió aquí.

English: The only path forward to end the curse of the Sea King is to slay the beast in its lair. Go forth and do the deed, for Coral Island!
Spanish: El única forma de poner fin a la maldición del Rey del Mar es matar a la bestia en su guarida. ¡Adelante, hazlo por Isla Coral!

English: Those who lose their mind to the Sea King are said to become faceless.
Spanish: Se dice que aquellos que pierden la cabeza ante el Rey del Mar se quedan sin rostro.

English: Welcome back from Coral Island, hero! And what a story to tell, it's true that Coral Island is a fascinating place.
Spanish: ¡Bienvenido de nuevo a Isla Coral, héroe! Vaya historia que contar, realmente Isla Coral es un lugar fascinante.

English: BoBu and the Coral Island villagers sent something by mail for you as a way to say thanks. Perhaps they were too shy to give it to you themselves!
Spanish: BoBu y los aldeanos de Isla Coral te enviaron algo por correo como forma de agradecimiento. ¡Quizás fueron demasiado tímidos para dártelo ellos mismos!

English: The Sea King consumes all who look into the void.
Spanish: El Rey del Mar consume a todos los que miran al vacío.

English: Ultimate Crafting
Spanish: Elaboración Definitiva

English: Orbs of Power
Spanish: Orbes de Poder

English: Your arrival has come at a critical time, hero. Bring me Ultima, and in return I shall grant you the key to ultimate power.
Spanish: Has llegado en un momento crítico, héroe. Tráeme a Ultima y, a cambio, te daré la llave del poder supremo.

English: Collect Ultima from the giant creatures that live on Coral Island, or from chests of plunder deep in The Wilds.
Spanish: Recoge Ultima de criaturas gigantes que viven en Isla Coral o de cofres de botín en lo profundo de Los Salvajes.

English: Without Ultima I cannot grant the ultimate power you seek.
Spanish: Sin Ultima no puedo otorgarte el poder supremo que buscas.

English: Well done, hero... I bestow upon you the power of the Ultimate Orb. Combine this with Shining Oricalkum and obtain ultimate power!
Spanish: Bien hecho, héroe. Te otorgo el poder del Orbe Definitivo. ¡Combina esto con Oricalco Brillante y obtén el máximo poder!

English: I need more Ultima to complete the ritual.
Spanish: Necesito más Ultima para completar el ritual.

English: Collect ten Ultima from the giants of Coral Island and treasure chests in The Wilds.
Spanish: Recoge diez Ultima de los gigantes de Isla Coral y cofres del tesoro en Los Salvajes.

English: New Hero
Spanish: Nuevo Héroe

English: Your will and ability have proven you to be a master in both thought and deed. Now that you've shown your true strength, it is time for your final task.
Spanish: Tu voluntad y tu capacidad han demostrado que eres un maestro tanto en pensamiento como en acción. Ahora que has demostrado tu verdadera fuerza, es hora de tu tarea final.

English: I need you to reach level 125 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!
Spanish: Necesito que alcances el nivel 125 y traigas $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. ¡Solo un verdadero héroe puede hacer eso!

English: Reach level 125 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.
Spanish: Alcanza el nivel 125 y trae $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.

English: New Year's Hunt
Spanish: Caza de Año Nuevo

English: Celebrating 2024, let's hunt 2024 monsters!\nWhat do you say?"
Spanish: Celebrando 2024, ¡Cacemos monstruos de 2024! \n¿Qué dices?"

English: "Great! I know you'll make it for sure!\nHere's to a new year full of adventures in 2024!!!"
Spanish: "¡Genial! ¡Sé que lo lograrás! \n¡¡¡Por un Nuevo 2024 lleno de aventuras!!!"

English: "It's a shame, because I've got the best New Year's gift ever…"
Spanish: "Es una pena, porque tengo el mejor regalo de Año Nuevo de todos los tiempos..."

English: "You've done great~ Here's your New Year's gift~\nLet's see how lucky you are this year!!!"
Spanish: "Lo has hecho genial~ Aquí está tu regalo de Año Nuevo~\n¡¡¡Veamos qué suerte tienes este año!!!"

English: "Are you still a long way off? We're running out of time! Please hurry up!"
Spanish: "¿Todavía estás muy lejos? ¡Se nos acaba el tiempo! ¡Por favor, apúrate!"

English: Defeat the monsters and return to Auxilior.
Spanish: Derrota a los monstruos y regresa con Auxilior.

English: Collecting Candy Shells
Spanish: Collecting Candy Shells

English: Madrigal is being polluted by discarded candy shells everywhere!! We need your help!!
Spanish: Madrigal is being polluted by discarded candy shells everywhere!! We need your help!!

English: Thank you so much!! I won't forget your help!!
Spanish: Thank you so much!! I won't forget your help!!

English: I have a special gift for you, but it's a shame...
Spanish: I have a special gift for you, but it's a shame...

English: I'm so proud to see Madrigal cleaned up~!
Spanish: I'm so proud to see Madrigal cleaned up~!

English: Hang in there!!
Spanish: Hang in there!!

English: Collect the candy shells and return to Auxilior.
Spanish: Collect the candy shells and return to Auxilior.

English: Spring Monster Ball
Spanish: Spring Monster Ball

English: Hello Adventurer! Would you like to take a suggestion about hunting a stronger monster?
Spanish: Hello Adventurer! Would you like to take a suggestion about hunting a stronger monster?

English: Great! Show me what you can do first!
Spanish: Great! Show me what you can do first!

English: That's too bad, please join us next time!
Spanish: That's too bad, please join us next time!

English: Thank you. Here is your Monster Ball. Please be cautious!\nNo one knows what kind of powerful monster will come out.
Spanish: Thank you. Here is your Monster Ball. Please be cautious!\nNo one knows what kind of powerful monster will come out.

English: Are we there yet? We don't have much time.
Spanish: Are we there yet? We don't have much time.

English: Complete all 3 missions.
Spanish: Complete all 3 missions.

English: Couple Ring Hunt
Spanish: Couple Ring Hunt

English: If you bring me the coupling, I will give you something really good. Go get it.
Spanish: If you bring me the coupling, I will give you something really good. Go get it.

English: Thanks for granting my request. I've heard through the grapevine that there's been a lot of frauds playing with fake couple rings lately, so you'd better be careful.
Spanish: Thanks for granting my request. I've heard through the grapevine that there's been a lot of frauds playing with fake couple rings lately, so you'd better be careful.

English: What? Where in the world is such a couple ring? So you're saying I'm lying? If you don't believe me, get off!
Spanish: What? Where in the world is such a couple ring? So you're saying I'm lying? If you don't believe me, get off!

English: Did you manage to get the couple ring already? This is a fake! Didn't I warn you not to get scammed. But I'm giving it to you for your efforts, so take it.
Spanish: Did you manage to get the couple ring already? This is a fake! Didn't I warn you not to get scammed. But I'm giving it to you for your efforts, so take it.

English: Still haven't found the coupling? Hmm...well, that could be... I mean, where would a legendary couple ring be so easy to find?
Spanish: Still haven't found the coupling? Hmm...well, that could be... I mean, where would a legendary couple ring be so easy to find?

English: Hunt the monsters and gather couple rings!
Spanish: Hunt the monsters and gather couple rings!

English: Roll your dice
Spanish: Roll your dice

English: Complete all missions.
Spanish: Complete all missions.

English: Couple Daily Quests
Spanish: Couple Daily Quests

English: Hunt the monsters and gather couple rings!
Spanish: Hunt the monsters and gather couple rings!

English: I'm so glad to see how in love you are. Go collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ from the Nyangnyangs in northern Flaris, then return to me.
Spanish: I'm so glad to see how in love you are. Go collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ from the Nyangnyangs in northern Flaris, then return to me.

English: I can feel these charms emitting love waves. Soon everyone will know how special your love is!
Spanish: I can feel these charms emitting love waves. Soon everyone will know how special your love is!

English: I'm sorry, were you unable to find the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Perhaps they only appear for those truly in love.
Spanish: I'm sorry, were you unable to find the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Perhaps they only appear for those truly in love.

English: Bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me to prove the strength of your love!
Spanish: Bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me to prove the strength of your love!

English: Kill Demian Thieves
Spanish: Kill Demian Thieves

English: Welcome! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$. Could you please work together to defeat the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?
Spanish: Welcome! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$. Could you please work together to defeat the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted somewhere in Madrigal. Check your map for hints for where they may be hiding!
Spanish: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted somewhere in Madrigal. Check your map for hints for where they may be hiding!

English: The power of your love have vanquished the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ threat, thank you!
Spanish: The power of your love have vanquished the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ threat, thank you!

English: Were you unable to find and defeat $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ yet? Track them down to prove your love is true!
Spanish: Were you unable to find and defeat $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ yet? Track them down to prove your love is true!

English: Find Love Fish
Spanish: Find Love Fish

English: Have you heard of the legendary $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Legend has it that lovers who obtain the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ will be together forever.
Spanish: Have you heard of the legendary $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$? Legend has it that lovers who obtain the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ will be together forever.

English: Wonderful! The $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ is said to swim near Zaoma's Refuge in the middle of the Leren Mountains.
Spanish: Wonderful! The $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ is said to swim near Zaoma's Refuge in the middle of the Leren Mountains.

English: You've found the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$! Surely your love will be blessed to last forever.
Spanish: You've found the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$! Surely your love will be blessed to last forever.

English: I don't see the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. If you have trouble finding it, search near Zaoma in the Leren Mountains.
Spanish: I don't see the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. If you have trouble finding it, search near Zaoma in the Leren Mountains.

English: Bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me to prove the strength of your love!
Spanish: Bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me to prove the strength of your love!

Spanish: Kill Giggleboxes

Spanish: Kill Trangfoma

Spanish: Kill Doridoma

English: Collect Whispering Leaves from Risem
Spanish: Collect Whispering Leaves from Risem

English: In their spare time, Risems collect leaves that whisper sweet nothings. Spread love around Madrigal by bringing these $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me!
Spanish: In their spare time, Risems collect leaves that whisper sweet nothings. Spread love around Madrigal by bringing these $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ back to me!

English: I'm so glad to see how in love you are. Go collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ from the Risems in Darken, then return to me.
Spanish: I'm so glad to see how in love you are. Go collect $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ from the Risems in Darken, then return to me.

English: Can you hear the leaves speak? Soon everyone will know how special your love is!
Spanish: Can you hear the leaves speak? Soon everyone will know how special your love is!

English: A Date on Mars!
Spanish: A Date on Mars!

English: What could be more romantic than frolicking near the Bangs of Northern Flaris? A picnic outside of Mars Mine sounds outstanding!
Spanish: What could be more romantic than frolicking near the Bangs of Northern Flaris? A picnic outside of Mars Mine sounds outstanding!

English: Wonderful, then the date is set. Enjoy your time sightseeing at the Mars Mine!
Spanish: Wonderful, then the date is set. Enjoy your time sightseeing at the Mars Mine!

English: Not a fan of Bangs? Well, there's always the Nyangnyangs.
Spanish: Not a fan of Bangs? Well, there's always the Nyangnyangs.

English: How was the date? Hopefully the Bangs weren't too distracting.
Spanish: How was the date? Hopefully the Bangs weren't too distracting.

English: Oh, so the Bangs were too distracting after all. Maybe you need to take a cold bath?
Spanish: Oh, so the Bangs were too distracting after all. Maybe you need to take a cold bath?

English: Go on a romantic date outside the entrance of Mars Mine!
Spanish: Go on a romantic date outside the entrance of Mars Mine!

English: Welcome! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$. Could you please slay the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?
Spanish: Welcome! Another request has come in to clear out $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$. Could you please slay the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and return to me once you are done?

English: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted somewhere in Madrigal.
Spanish: The $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ has been spotted somewhere in Madrigal.

English: Some days we don't feel productive. I understand.
Spanish: Some days we don't feel productive. I understand.

English: Collect Rainbow Flowers
Spanish: Collect Rainbow Flowers

English: Welcome! We require flowers blessed by lovers. Could you please collect Rainbow Flowers, and return to me once you are done?
Spanish: Welcome! We require flowers blessed by lovers. Could you please collect Rainbow Flowers, and return to me once you are done?

English: Wonderful! The rare flowers grow near the large tree in Saint Morning where no one flies.
Spanish: Wonderful! The rare flowers grow near the large tree in Saint Morning where no one flies.

English: These flowers are perfect. With your help I can now bless all of Madrigal with love!
Spanish: These flowers are perfect. With your help I can now bless all of Madrigal with love!

English: Oh no, that's not right. The flowers are in Saint Morning. If you get lost, remember to check your map!
Spanish: Oh no, that's not right. The flowers are in Saint Morning. If you get lost, remember to check your map!

English: Head to the Plateau of Silence in Saint Morning, and retrieve the Wild Rainbow Flowers.
Spanish: Head to the Plateau of Silence in Saint Morning, and retrieve the Wild Rainbow Flowers.

English: Collect Heart Charms from Nyangnyang
Spanish: Collect Heart Charms from Nyangnyang

English: Nyangnyangs possess charms bursting with the power of love. With a few of these charms, you can show Madrigal how strong your love is!
Spanish: Nyangnyangs possess charms bursting with the power of love. With a few of these charms, you can show Madrigal how strong your love is!

English: You can gather herbs with a hoe. Want to learn how to gather herbs?
Spanish: You can gather herbs with a hoe. Want to learn how to gather herbs?

English: Good. Then go out into the field and try to gather some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Spanish: Good. Then go out into the field and try to gather some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: There you go. It's easier than you think, isn't it? Just remember, the most important thing is to do 'a lot'.
Spanish: There you go. It's easier than you think, isn't it? Just remember, the most important thing is to do 'a lot'.

English: Woodcutting Class
Spanish: Woodcutting Class

English: You can chop trees with an axe. Would you like to learn woodcutting?
Spanish: You can chop trees with an axe. Would you like to learn woodcutting?

English: Good. Then go out into the field and chop some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Spanish: Good. Then go out into the field and chop some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

Spanish: Mining Class

English: You can dig up ores with a pickaxe. Would you like to learn mining?
Spanish: You can dig up ores with a pickaxe. Would you like to learn mining?

English: Good. Then go out into the field and try to dig some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Spanish: Good. Then go out into the field and try to dig some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

Spanish: Fishing Class

English: Once you get to know thrill of fishing, it's hard to get away from it. What do you say, learn?
Spanish: Once you get to know thrill of fishing, it's hard to get away from it. What do you say, learn?

English: Good. Then go to the nearest river and try fishing. Whether you succeed or fail, it'll help you a lot.

Spanish: Once you learn the alchemy, you can brew your own buff potion to carry with. Want to learn?

English: Good. Try anything on the caldron nearby. Caldron is near the magic shop.
Spanish: Good. Try anything on the caldron nearby. Caldron is near the magic shop.

Spanish: Cooking Class

English: Food is the basic of survival. Why don't you cook on your own?
Spanish: Food is the basic of survival. Why don't you cook on your own?

English: Good. Try anything on the oven nearby. Oven is near the food shop.
Spanish: Good. Try anything on the oven nearby. Oven is near the food shop.

Spanish: Carpentry Class

English: You can make furniture out of wood. Would you like to learn carpenting?

English: Okay, try anything on the woodcutting tools nearby. The woodcutting tools are near the Housing Manager.
Spanish: Okay, try anything on the woodcutting tools nearby. The woodcutting tools are near the Housing Manager.

Spanish: Smithing Class

English: You can make furniture out of wood. Would you like to learn carpenting?

English: Okay, try anything at the nearest crafting tool. The tools are near the jewelry.

English: Thanksgiving Turkey
Spanish: Thanksgiving Turkey

English: Help the mayor cook his turkey for thanksgiving.\nHunt monsters (Lv. -10 to Lv. +10 from your level) to earn [Event] Turkeys.
Spanish: Help the mayor cook his turkey for thanksgiving.\nHunt monsters (Lv. -10 to Lv. +10 from your level) to earn [Event] Turkeys.

English: Hello, adventurer! I'm planning to cook a turkey for the village. Do you have a moment to help?
Spanish: Hello, adventurer! I'm planning to cook a turkey for the village. Do you have a moment to help?

English: Great! Actually, I tried to cook it myself, but while I left the ingredients outside, monsters stole them all! Can you help me get them back?
Spanish: Great! Actually, I tried to cook it myself, but while I left the ingredients outside, monsters stole them all! Can you help me get them back?

English: That's a shame. I'll try to figure something out on my own.
Spanish: That's a shame. I'll try to figure something out on my own.

English: Thank you so much! I can finish cooking in time. Happy Thanksgiving!
Spanish: Thank you so much! I can finish cooking in time. Happy Thanksgiving!

English: Are you done yet? The villagers are eagerly waiting!
Spanish: Are you done yet? The villagers are eagerly waiting!

English: Go out into the field and try to gather some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Spanish: Go out into the field and try to gather some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Go out into the field and chop some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Spanish: Go out into the field and chop some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Go out into the field and try to dig some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.
Spanish: Go out into the field and try to dig some. It will be a great help, whether you succeed or not.

English: Go to the nearest river and try fishing. Whether you succeed or fail, it'll help you a lot.
Spanish: Go to the nearest river and try fishing. Whether you succeed or fail, it'll help you a lot.

English: Try anything on the caldron nearby. Caldron is near the magic shop.
Spanish: Try anything on the caldron nearby. Caldron is near the magic shop.

English: Try anything on the oven nearby. Oven is near the food shop.
Spanish: Try anything on the oven nearby. Oven is near the food shop.

English: Try anything on the woodcutting tools nearby. The woodcutting tools are near the Housing Manager.
Spanish: Try anything on the woodcutting tools nearby. The woodcutting tools are near the Housing Manager.

English: Try anything at the nearest crafting tool. The tools are near the jewelry.
Spanish: Try anything at the nearest crafting tool. The tools are near the jewelry.

English: Hero Grade (2)
Spanish: Hero Grade (2)

English: I need you to reach level 140 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!
Spanish: I need you to reach level 140 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!

English: Reach level 140 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.
Spanish: Reach level 140 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.

English: Hero Grade (3)
Spanish: Hero Grade (3)

English: I need you to reach level 160 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!
Spanish: I need you to reach level 160 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$. Only a real Hero can do that!

English: Reach level 160 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.
Spanish: Reach level 160 and bring $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$.

English: Rumble from the Depths
Spanish: Rumble from the Depths

English: (H-Hiii…!) T-tremors... w-waves... taller than a Clockworks... (Gulp) A... a deafening noise... Wh-what’s going on?!
Spanish: (H-Hiii…!) T-tremors... w-waves... taller than a Clockworks... (Gulp) A... a deafening noise... Wh-what’s going on?!

English: What?! You’re not aware??! But where have you been?! Honestly… We can never count on you to keep an eye on our precious world…
Spanish: What?! You’re not aware??! But where have you been?! Honestly… We can never count on you to keep an eye on our precious world…

English: Well… listen. It doesn’t matter, I’ll need you. I have no idea what happened, or even where exactly… (hesitation) But I feel like the deafening noise came from the Krakens side.
Spanish: Well… listen. It doesn’t matter, I’ll need you. I have no idea what happened, or even where exactly… (hesitation) But I feel like the deafening noise came from the Krakens side.

English: I would have gone myself, but you see… (looking away) I still have a lot to do, and there are other adventurers I need to take care of… (coughs) And don’t think I’m scared, okay! It has nothing to do with that, absolutely nothing!
Spanish: I would have gone myself, but you see… (looking away) I still have a lot to do, and there are other adventurers I need to take care of… (coughs) And don’t think I’m scared, okay! It has nothing to do with that, absolutely nothing!

English: Find the location of the events and see what’s happening there
Spanish: Find the location of the events and see what’s happening there

English: Ah! Finally, someone reliable! I knew I could count on you. Go quickly, check near the Krakens side, and come back to tell me what you find. I’m sure you’ll do an excellent job! But… be careful, alright? That rumble wasn’t normal...
Spanish: Ah! Finally, someone reliable! I knew I could count on you. Go quickly, check near the Krakens side, and come back to tell me what you find. I’m sure you’ll do an excellent job! But… be careful, alright? That rumble wasn’t normal...

English: What?! You’re not going?! Really… We can’t count on anyone… Fine, do as you wish, but remember that this world needs protectors, not cowards. And don’t come complaining if things get worse without you!
Spanish: What?! You’re not going?! Really… We can’t count on anyone… Fine, do as you wish, but remember that this world needs protectors, not cowards. And don’t come complaining if things get worse without you!

English: Starfish… coral… and all kinds of little sea things coming together to form… a portal?! This is insane… How could this be possible?!
Spanish: Starfish… coral… and all kinds of little sea things coming together to form… a portal?! This is insane… How could this be possible?!

English: You’re back already? But… don’t tell me you haven’t checked out the source of that noise yet! We need to know what’s happening on the Krakens side. Go on, get moving! The world’s not going to protect itself, you know!
Spanish: You’re back already? But… don’t tell me you haven’t checked out the source of that noise yet! We need to know what’s happening on the Krakens side. Go on, get moving! The world’s not going to protect itself, you know!

English: Magic water stone of Herneos
Spanish: Magic water stone of Herneos

English: Hmm… If what you’re telling me is true, it would correspond to a well-known legend of Madrigal… Once upon a time, in the Old World, Herneos was a prosperous city where everyone dreamed of living, a true underwater paradise with magnificent architecture.
Spanish: Hmm… If what you’re telling me is true, it would correspond to a well-known legend of Madrigal… Once upon a time, in the Old World, Herneos was a prosperous city where everyone dreamed of living, a true underwater paradise with magnificent architecture.

English: But one day, Shade pierced the glass bubble that protected Herneos from the depths of the ocean, and the city sank… along with its inhabitants. Since then, despite numerous searches, we have never found this lost city. But if you’re telling me a portal has opened…
Spanish: But one day, Shade pierced the glass bubble that protected Herneos from the depths of the ocean, and the city sank… along with its inhabitants. Since then, despite numerous searches, we have never found this lost city. But if you’re telling me a portal has opened…

English: I’m afraid Shade has finally found a way to return to the city of Herneos… For what purpose? I have no idea, but we need to ensure it is indeed the city of Herneos…
Spanish: I’m afraid Shade has finally found a way to return to the city of Herneos… For what purpose? I have no idea, but we need to ensure it is indeed the city of Herneos…

English: Bring back a magical water stone from the discovered location and have it analyzed by Dr. Estly
Spanish: Bring back a magical water stone from the discovered location and have it analyzed by Dr. Estly

English: Ah, thank you! I knew you’d understand the urgency. If this really is a magical water stone from Herneos, then Shade’s reach might be spreading in ways we never expected… Please, bring back a stone as soon as you can. And be careful Herneos may be more dangerous now than we imagine.
Spanish: Ah, thank you! I knew you’d understand the urgency. If this really is a magical water stone from Herneos, then Shade’s reach might be spreading in ways we never expected… Please, bring back a stone as soon as you can. And be careful Herneos may be more dangerous now than we imagine.

English: What?! You’re not interested in helping with this? You don’t understand this isn’t just some small errand! Herneos could be the key to untold mysteries… and maybe even threats. But fine, if you can’t be bothered, I’ll just have to find someone else…
Spanish: What?! You’re not interested in helping with this? You don’t understand this isn’t just some small errand! Herneos could be the key to untold mysteries… and maybe even threats. But fine, if you can’t be bothered, I’ll just have to find someone else…

English: Ah, you've returned with the magical water stone! Thank you! I'll begin the analysis right away to confirm its origin.
Spanish: Ah, you've returned with the magical water stone! Thank you! I'll begin the analysis right away to confirm its origin.

English: Back so soon? You don’t have the magical water stone yet? We’re counting on that stone to prove if it’s truly from Herneos. Shade’s power might be stronger than we thought, so time is crucial. Please, return as soon as you have it!
Spanish: Back so soon? You don’t have the magical water stone yet? We’re counting on that stone to prove if it’s truly from Herneos. Shade’s power might be stronger than we thought, so time is crucial. Please, return as soon as you have it!

English: Under Shade's Command
Spanish: Under Shade's Command

English: What?! Monsters? Whole hordes?! Listen… Shade must already be at work, and if she’s there, she won’t waste any time.
Spanish: What?! Monsters? Whole hordes?! Listen… Shade must already be at work, and if she’s there, she won’t waste any time.

English: I’ll need you to return there. Observe, fight, assess their strengths… If these creatures are really under Shade’s control, we need to know what awaits us.
Spanish: I’ll need you to return there. Observe, fight, assess their strengths… If these creatures are really under Shade’s control, we need to know what awaits us.

English: When you’ve dealt with the monsters, return to see Dr. Estly. He should have finished the analysis of the water by then, and we’ll finally know if this submerged city is indeed Herneos…
Spanish: When you’ve dealt with the monsters, return to see Dr. Estly. He should have finished the analysis of the water by then, and we’ll finally know if this submerged city is indeed Herneos…

English: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s, $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT,2$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,2$s, $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT,3$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,3$s and return talk to Sovann.
Spanish: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s, $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT,2$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,2$s, $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT,3$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,3$s and return talk to Sovann.

English: Excellent! I knew I could count on you. The creatures under Shade’s command won’t go down easily, but with your skills, I’m confident you can handle them. Go, and show them that we won’t back down! Once you've dealt with them, check back with Sovann.
Spanish: Excellent! I knew I could count on you. The creatures under Shade’s command won’t go down easily, but with your skills, I’m confident you can handle them. Go, and show them that we won’t back down! Once you've dealt with them, check back with Sovann.

English: What?! You’re refusing?! Don’t you see how serious this is? Shade’s forces won’t stop they’ll only get stronger if we ignore them. Fine, if you’re not willing to help, I’ll find someone who is up to the challenge. But don’t forget you might regret standing by if Shade succeeds.
Spanish: What?! You’re refusing?! Don’t you see how serious this is? Shade’s forces won’t stop they’ll only get stronger if we ignore them. Fine, if you’re not willing to help, I’ll find someone who is up to the challenge. But don’t forget you might regret standing by if Shade succeeds.

English: You’re back again? But… have you not dealt with those monsters yet? We need to know what we’re up against! Shade’s forces are growing stronger every moment you delay. Go back and finish the job! Time is of the essence, and the fate of Herneos depends on it!
Spanish: You’re back again? But… have you not dealt with those monsters yet? We need to know what we’re up against! Shade’s forces are growing stronger every moment you delay. Go back and finish the job! Time is of the essence, and the fate of Herneos depends on it!

English: You did it! I knew you could handle those monsters! Thank you for stepping up when we needed it the most.
Spanish: You did it! I knew you could handle those monsters! Thank you for stepping up when we needed it the most.

English: Seeking the Truth of Herneos
Spanish: Seeking the Truth of Herneos

English: I’m afraid I don’t have the knowledge necessary to interpret the results correctly.
Spanish: I’m afraid I don’t have the knowledge necessary to interpret the results correctly.

English: Listen, take this sample and bring it to Martinyc the historian of Flarine. Only she has the archives and the skills to compare and tell you what’s going on! If this water is really connected to Herneos, she’ll know.
Spanish: Listen, take this sample and bring it to Martinyc the historian of Flarine. Only she has the archives and the skills to compare and tell you what’s going on! If this water is really connected to Herneos, she’ll know.

English: Take the analysis result to Martinyc the historian of Flarine
Spanish: Take the analysis result to Martinyc the historian of Flarine

English: Thank you! I knew you’d understand the importance of this. Martinyc is our best hope for interpreting these results. Take the sample to her right away, and let’s hope she can shed some light on this mystery! The fate of Herneos could depend on it!
Spanish: Thank you! I knew you’d understand the importance of this. Martinyc is our best hope for interpreting these results. Take the sample to her right away, and let’s hope she can shed some light on this mystery! The fate of Herneos could depend on it!

English: What? You’re turning this down? This is vital information that could unlock the secrets of Herneos! If you won’t help now, I don’t know what we’ll do. Fine, but don’t forget that knowledge is power, and you might regret passing on this opportunity!
Spanish: What? You’re turning this down? This is vital information that could unlock the secrets of Herneos! If you won’t help now, I don’t know what we’ll do. Fine, but don’t forget that knowledge is power, and you might regret passing on this opportunity!

English: You’re back? But… have you not delivered the sample to Martinyc yet? We need her expertise to understand what the analysis reveals! Time is running out, and if this water is connected to Herneos, we need to act quickly. Go now, before it’s too late!
Spanish: You’re back? But… have you not delivered the sample to Martinyc yet? We need her expertise to understand what the analysis reveals! Time is running out, and if this water is connected to Herneos, we need to act quickly. Go now, before it’s too late!

English: Trophies from the Depths
Spanish: Trophies from the Depths

English: Hello, who are you?... Oh, you must be the adventurer Estly told me about! Nice to meet you. How can I assist you?
Spanish: Hello, who are you?... Oh, you must be the adventurer Estly told me about! Nice to meet you. How can I assist you?

English: Oh, you want me to interpret the results of this analysis to check, using the archives, if this water is indeed from the city of Herneos?
Spanish: Oh, you want me to interpret the results of this analysis to check, using the archives, if this water is indeed from the city of Herneos?

English: (Smirking) But nothing comes for free, you know! I heard there are all-new monsters, never seen before, over there…
Spanish: (Smirking) But nothing comes for free, you know! I heard there are all-new monsters, never seen before, over there…

English: While I compare the results, could you bring me samples or souvenirs from each creature? That would allow me to enrich our archives on these strange appearances.
Spanish: While I compare the results, could you bring me samples or souvenirs from each creature? That would allow me to enrich our archives on these strange appearances.

English: Bring back $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$, $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,2$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,2$, $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,3$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,3$
Spanish: Bring back $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$, $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,2$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,2$, $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT,3$x $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,3$

English: Ah, wonderful! I knew you’d be up for the task. These new creatures are unlike anything we've documented, so any samples you bring will be invaluable. While you’re collecting them, I’ll start the comparison. Come back once you have the items, and we’ll see what these archives reveal about Herneos.
Spanish: Ah, wonderful! I knew you’d be up for the task. These new creatures are unlike anything we've documented, so any samples you bring will be invaluable. While you’re collecting them, I’ll start the comparison. Come back once you have the items, and we’ll see what these archives reveal about Herneos.

English: Really? You’re refusing? (Sighs) I suppose not everyone appreciates the importance of history… But fine, go ahead just remember that these discoveries are rare. Who knows if you'll get another chance to contribute to our knowledge of Herneos.
Spanish: Really? You’re refusing? (Sighs) I suppose not everyone appreciates the importance of history… But fine, go ahead just remember that these discoveries are rare. Who knows if you'll get another chance to contribute to our knowledge of Herneos.

English: Ohhh, thank you for these souvenirs! I can finally… continue my collection... uh, enrich the city archives! (clears throat) Yes, of course, the archives!
Spanish: Ohhh, thank you for these souvenirs! I can finally… continue my collection... uh, enrich the city archives! (clears throat) Yes, of course, the archives!

English: Ah, you’re back? But… I don’t see any of the samples I asked for. These souvenirs from the creatures are essential to my research, you know! Please, gather them quickly and return. The archives await your findings!
Spanish: Ah, you’re back? But… I don’t see any of the samples I asked for. These souvenirs from the creatures are essential to my research, you know! Please, gather them quickly and return. The archives await your findings!

English: Unveiling Herneos
Spanish: Unveiling Herneos

English: Ah, yes, the analysis results… So, according to our archives, the water you retrieved matches 100% with that of the city of Herneos! It is indeed it You should quickly go announce this news to Sovann !
Spanish: Ah, yes, the analysis results… So, according to our archives, the water you retrieved matches 100% with that of the city of Herneos! It is indeed it You should quickly go announce this news to Sovann !

English: Go tell Sovann it is indeed Herneos
Spanish: Go tell Sovann it is indeed Herneos

English: Fantastic! Thank you so much for delivering the news. Sovann will be thrilled or perhaps a bit anxious to hear it. Go quickly and let him know that Herneos has indeed resurfaced. We might be on the brink of something monumental!
Spanish: Fantastic! Thank you so much for delivering the news. Sovann will be thrilled or perhaps a bit anxious to hear it. Go quickly and let him know that Herneos has indeed resurfaced. We might be on the brink of something monumental!

English: Wait… you’re not going to tell him? This is crucial information! Herneos is real, and Sovann needs to know. Fine, if you won’t go, but don’t say I didn’t warn you… Discoveries like this don’t come every day, and neither does the chance to be part of history.
Spanish: Wait… you’re not going to tell him? This is crucial information! Herneos is real, and Sovann needs to know. Fine, if you won’t go, but don’t say I didn’t warn you… Discoveries like this don’t come every day, and neither does the chance to be part of history.

English: What?? It’s really the lost city of Herneos?! (in awe) It’s incredible to see this iconic city again!
Spanish: What?? It’s really the lost city of Herneos?! (in awe) It’s incredible to see this iconic city again!

English: Oh, you’re back… but you still haven’t told Sovann? This is monumental news... Herneos has been confirmed! Please, don’t delay any longer. Sovann must hear this right away; the implications are too important to keep to ourselves!
Spanish: Oh, you’re back… but you still haven’t told Sovann? This is monumental news... Herneos has been confirmed! Please, don’t delay any longer. Sovann must hear this right away; the implications are too important to keep to ourselves!

English: Herneos: The Golden Legacy
Spanish: Herneos: The Golden Legacy

English: Listen, you should check if the treasure is still there! What treasure?! The treasure of Herneos, of course! You can’t miss it: gold, jewels, valuable items... a true legend!
Spanish: Listen, you should check if the treasure is still there! What treasure?! The treasure of Herneos, of course! You can’t miss it: gold, jewels, valuable items... a true legend!

English: So, what are you waiting for? Hurry before Shade gets her hands on it!
Spanish: So, what are you waiting for? Hurry before Shade gets her hands on it!

English: Check if the treasure is still there
Spanish: Check if the treasure is still there

English: Yes! I knew you wouldn’t pass up a chance like this. The treasure of Herneos is the stuff of legends if it’s still there, it could be a discovery of a lifetime! Go quickly, and make sure you get there before Shade does. Good luck!
Spanish: Yes! I knew you wouldn’t pass up a chance like this. The treasure of Herneos is the stuff of legends if it’s still there, it could be a discovery of a lifetime! Go quickly, and make sure you get there before Shade does. Good luck!

English: You’re… refusing? Are you serious?! This is the legendary treasure of Herneos! Opportunities like this don’t come around twice, you know. Fine, but don’t say I didn’t give you the chance to be part of something unforgettable.
Spanish: You’re… refusing? Are you serious?! This is the legendary treasure of Herneos! Opportunities like this don’t come around twice, you know. Fine, but don’t say I didn’t give you the chance to be part of something unforgettable.

English: The treasure is still there?! Great news! But… it’s possible that all is not lost, if we act quickly. Very quickly.
Spanish: The treasure is still there?! Great news! But… it’s possible that all is not lost, if we act quickly. Very quickly.

English: Cutting Shade's Power
Spanish: Cutting Shade's Power

English: I know it’s a lot to ask, but… could you start by eliminating the two generals of Shade’s army that you spotted in Herneos? (determined look) That should slow down Shade’s advance and considerably weaken her right hand.
Spanish: I know it’s a lot to ask, but… could you start by eliminating the two generals of Shade’s army that you spotted in Herneos? (determined look) That should slow down Shade’s advance and considerably weaken her right hand.

English: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ & $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,2$ the two generals of Shade at Herneos
Spanish: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ & $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME,2$ the two generals of Shade at Herneos

English: Thank you! With Shade’s generals out of the way, we might actually stand a chance. I know it won’t be easy, but you’re the only one who can do it. Go now, and show them that we won’t let Herneos fall under Shade’s control!
Spanish: Thank you! With Shade’s generals out of the way, we might actually stand a chance. I know it won’t be easy, but you’re the only one who can do it. Go now, and show them that we won’t let Herneos fall under Shade’s control!

English: What?! You’re backing out now? This is no time for hesitation! Shade’s forces are closing in, and without your help, we may not be able to hold them back. But fine, if you won’t act, we’ll have to hope someone else is up for the challenge…
Spanish: What?! You’re backing out now? This is no time for hesitation! Shade’s forces are closing in, and without your help, we may not be able to hold them back. But fine, if you won’t act, we’ll have to hope someone else is up for the challenge…

English: What?! You did it already?! (beaming smile) I can’t believe it! It’s incredible to count on you. You’re our true savior!
Spanish: What?! You did it already?! (beaming smile) I can’t believe it! It’s incredible to count on you. You’re our true savior!

English: You’re back... but the two generals of Shade are still standing? Every moment they’re left unchecked, Herneos is at greater risk. We’re counting on you to stop them. There’s no time to lose!
Spanish: You’re back... but the two generals of Shade are still standing? Every moment they’re left unchecked, Herneos is at greater risk. We’re counting on you to stop them. There’s no time to lose!

English: The Final Battle for Herneos
Spanish: The Final Battle for Herneos

English: Now that you’ve weakened the boss by taking out the two generals of Shade’s army, it would be wise for you to face her right hand before he regains his full power.
Spanish: Now that you’ve weakened the boss by taking out the two generals of Shade’s army, it would be wise for you to face her right hand before he regains his full power.

English: Me, go with you?!? (nervous laugh) Oh no, no… they always say not to change a winning team, and our way of teaming up is simply perfect, don’t you think?
Spanish: Me, go with you?!? (nervous laugh) Oh no, no… they always say not to change a winning team, and our way of teaming up is simply perfect, don’t you think?

English: And if you succeed, don’t forget to stop by the mayor of Flarine, he will surely reward you generously for this achievement!
Spanish: And if you succeed, don’t forget to stop by the mayor of Flarine, he will surely reward you generously for this achievement!

English: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ and return back to me.
Spanish: Kill $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ and return back to me.

English: Amazing! I knew I could count on you to see this through. Facing Shade’s right hand won’t be easy, but if anyone can do it, it’s you. Just remember if you succeed, don’t forget to see the mayor in Flarine. I’m sure he’ll have a worthy reward for you. Good luck, hero!
Spanish: Amazing! I knew I could count on you to see this through. Facing Shade’s right hand won’t be easy, but if anyone can do it, it’s you. Just remember if you succeed, don’t forget to see the mayor in Flarine. I’m sure he’ll have a worthy reward for you. Good luck, hero!

English: What?! You’re refusing? After all we’ve done to get this far? This is the final step! If you don’t finish this, Shade’s influence will only grow stronger. But… if you won’t go, we’ll just have to hope someone else has the courage. I only hope it’s not too late.
Spanish: What?! You’re refusing? After all we’ve done to get this far? This is the final step! If you don’t finish this, Shade’s influence will only grow stronger. But… if you won’t go, we’ll just have to hope someone else has the courage. I only hope it’s not too late.

English: Back already? But Shade’s right hand is still out there, gathering strength! This is our final chance to stop her influence from spreading through Herneos. Please finish what you started. All of Madrigal is depending on you!
Spanish: Back already? But Shade’s right hand is still out there, gathering strength! This is our final chance to stop her influence from spreading through Herneos. Please finish what you started. All of Madrigal is depending on you!

English: You did it! You've defeated Shade’s right hand! This is a monumental victory for Madrigal that will be remembered for ages. You’ve truly saved Herneos and brought hope back to our people.
Spanish: You did it! You've defeated Shade’s right hand! This is a monumental victory for Madrigal that will be remembered for ages. You’ve truly saved Herneos and brought hope back to our people.

English: Gratitude of the Mayor
Spanish: Gratitude of the Mayor

English: (Incredulous look) You did it… You really defeated Shade’s right hand?! (sigh of relief) I can’t believe it, this is incredible!
Spanish: (Incredulous look) You did it… You really defeated Shade’s right hand?! (sigh of relief) I can’t believe it, this is incredible!

English: Thanks to you, we finally have real hope to repel the darkness threatening Madrigal. You accomplished the impossible, where so many others would have failed.
Spanish: Thanks to you, we finally have real hope to repel the darkness threatening Madrigal. You accomplished the impossible, where so many others would have failed.

English: Take this… It’s a well-deserved reward. As the Mayor of Flaris, I thank you from the bottom of my heart for your courage and bravery!
Spanish: Take this… It’s a well-deserved reward. As the Mayor of Flaris, I thank you from the bottom of my heart for your courage and bravery!

English: I don’t know what Shade is planning next, but with you by our side, I’m sure we can face any danger. Thank you… really, thank you from the bottom of my heart, hero.
Spanish: I don’t know what Shade is planning next, but with you by our side, I’m sure we can face any danger. Thank you… really, thank you from the bottom of my heart, hero.

English: Rumor has it that the mayor of Flarine is eager to personally reward you for your recent achievement! You should definitely pay him a visit
Spanish: Rumor has it that the mayor of Flarine is eager to personally reward you for your recent achievement! You should definitely pay him a visit

English: Herneos: Ruins of Glory
Spanish: Herneos: Ruins of Glory

English: It may take a little time, though, so while I work, you might want to head back and speak with Captain Sovann. I’m sure he’ll have more for you to do in the meantime.
Spanish: It may take a little time, though, so while I work, you might want to head back and speak with Captain Sovann. I’m sure he’ll have more for you to do in the meantime.

English: Ah, you’re back! Did you manage to deliver the magical water stone to Dr. Estly? And what did you find along the way? Any signs of Shade’s forces?
Spanish: Ah, you’re back! Did you manage to deliver the magical water stone to Dr. Estly? And what did you find along the way? Any signs of Shade’s forces?

English: Thank you for reporting back to me. If Shade is behind these creatures, we need to assess the situation carefully. Go now and prepare yourself I fear this may only be the beginning.
Spanish: Thank you for reporting back to me. If Shade is behind these creatures, we need to assess the situation carefully. Go now and prepare yourself I fear this may only be the beginning.

English: Go back to Sovann and report that you have delivered the magical water stone to Dr. Estly and encountered Shade's forces along the way.
Spanish: Go back to Sovann and report that you have delivered the magical water stone to Dr. Estly and encountered Shade's forces along the way.

English: Reporting Back to Sovann
Spanish: Reporting Back to Sovann

English: You didn’t deliver the message yet? We need to be fully aware of what’s happening in Herneos. Hurry back and let Sovann know what you encountered.
Spanish: You didn’t deliver the message yet? We need to be fully aware of what’s happening in Herneos. Hurry back and let Sovann know what you encountered.

English: Very well! You’re truly dedicated to uncovering the mysteries of Herneos. Report back to Sovann with the details it’s crucial he knows about Shade’s forces. Thank you for stepping up; your bravery will be invaluable in this journey!
Spanish: Very well! You’re truly dedicated to uncovering the mysteries of Herneos. Report back to Sovann with the details it’s crucial he knows about Shade’s forces. Thank you for stepping up; your bravery will be invaluable in this journey!

English: What?! You’re turning back now? Reporting this information to Sovann is essential if we’re to understand Shade’s reach! But fine, if you’re not willing… Just remember, this discovery could change everything. Don’t let this chance slip by.
Spanish: What?! You’re turning back now? Reporting this information to Sovann is essential if we’re to understand Shade’s reach! But fine, if you’re not willing… Just remember, this discovery could change everything. Don’t let this chance slip by.

English: Return to Dr. Estly
Spanish: Return to Dr. Estly

English: Now, go see Dr. Estly; he should have finished the analysis of the water by now. We’re one step closer to uncovering the truth about Herneos!
Spanish: Now, go see Dr. Estly; he should have finished the analysis of the water by now. We’re one step closer to uncovering the truth about Herneos!

English: Excellent! The analysis should reveal invaluable information about Herneos. Head to Dr. Estly right away, and let’s finally uncover the secrets that lie within this legendary city!
Spanish: Excellent! The analysis should reveal invaluable information about Herneos. Head to Dr. Estly right away, and let’s finally uncover the secrets that lie within this legendary city!

English: Really? You’re choosing not to follow up on this? Dr. Estly’s analysis could be the key to understanding Herneos and possibly even stopping Shade. But if you won’t go, we’ll have to hope someone else steps up to the task.
Spanish: Really? You’re choosing not to follow up on this? Dr. Estly’s analysis could be the key to understanding Herneos and possibly even stopping Shade. But if you won’t go, we’ll have to hope someone else steps up to the task.

English: You haven’t visited Dr. Estly yet? The analysis of the water might hold crucial answers about Herneos! Time is ticking, and we need that information to understand what Shade might be planning. Please, head to him as soon as possible.
Spanish: You haven’t visited Dr. Estly yet? The analysis of the water might hold crucial answers about Herneos! Time is ticking, and we need that information to understand what Shade might be planning. Please, head to him as soon as possible.

English: The analysis is complete, but... (annoyed look)
Spanish: The analysis is complete, but... (annoyed look)

English: It’s time to return to Dr. Estly. The analysis should be complete by now, and with it, we might finally learn the truth about Herneos. Head back to her as soon as you can!
Spanish: It’s time to return to Dr. Estly. The analysis should be complete by now, and with it, we might finally learn the truth about Herneos. Head back to her as soon as you can!

English: A rumor says a great reward awaits you... Go speak to the mayor of Flarine!
Spanish: A rumor says a great reward awaits you... Go speak to the mayor of Flarine!

English: That's awesome! Hurry and go see the mayor!
Spanish: That's awesome! Hurry and go see the mayor!

English: What do you mean, no?! You've already done everything.. You just need to claim your reward from the mayor of Flarine!
Spanish: What do you mean, no?! You've already done everything.. You just need to claim your reward from the mayor of Flarine!

English: Do you think you could bring me a magical water stone from there? With an analysis of the stone, we can confirm if it truly originates from Herneos, as magical water stones can only be found in that legendary city.
Spanish: Do you think you could bring me a magical water stone from there? With an analysis of the stone, we can confirm if it truly originates from Herneos, as magical water stones can only be found in that legendary city.

English: Christmas Invasion 1
Spanish: Christmas Invasion 1

English: Christmas Invasion 2
Spanish: Christmas Invasion 2

English: Christmas Invasion 3
Spanish: Christmas Invasion 3

English: Year of the Snake 2025
Spanish: Year of the Snake 2025

English: A Taste of Inspiration
Spanish: A Taste of Inspiration

English: Oh, hello there, young adventurer! What a pleasure to meet you! Say, could you do me a favor?
Spanish: Oh, hello there, young adventurer! What a pleasure to meet you! Say, could you do me a favor?

English: There's a novelist in our lovely town whose work I deeply admire, but it seems he's feeling a bit down lately, which is delaying his next masterpiece.
Spanish: There's a novelist in our lovely town whose work I deeply admire, but it seems he's feeling a bit down lately, which is delaying his next masterpiece.

English: Would you be so kind as to deliver this to him on my behalf? I believe it might lift his spirits!
Spanish: Would you be so kind as to deliver this to him on my behalf? I believe it might lift his spirits!

English: Oh, wonderful! I knew I could count on you! This small gesture might be just what he needs to find inspiration again. Please, deliver it to him as soon as you can, and let me know how he reacts! Thank you, brave adventurer!
Spanish: Oh, wonderful! I knew I could count on you! This small gesture might be just what he needs to find inspiration again. Please, deliver it to him as soon as you can, and let me know how he reacts! Thank you, brave adventurer!
